questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible product?
What appears to be the primary material of the product's construction?
Considering the product's shape and features, what is its likely function?
Based on its form, what body part does this item seem designed to fit?
Describe the overall texture implied by the product's appearance.
What type of fastener is visible on the sides of the product?
What is the visible branding or logo present on the product?
How many straps are clearly visible for adjusting the product's fit?
What stitching style is predominantly observed on the seams?
What is the general shape of the main padded section of the product?
What is the apparent level of padding or thickness in the product?
Describe the visible finish or treatment of the material's edges.
Does the product exhibit any visible patterns or designs beyond its basic form?
What is the overall aesthetic style of this product; simple or complex?
Considering the material and design, what is the implied level of flexibility?
